original_text: King Nebuchadnezzar made an image of gold, whose height was sixty cubits and its breadth six cubits. He set it up on the plain of Dura, in the province of Babylon.
korean_text: 느부갓네살 왕이 금으로 신상을 만들었으니 높이는 육십 규빗이요 너비는 여섯 규빗이라 그것을 바벨론 지방의 두라 평지에 세웠더라

sentences.original_text: King Nebuchadnezzar made an image of gold
sentences.korean_translation: 느부갓네살 왕은 금으로 만든 형상을 세웠습니다

sentences.original_text: He set it up on the plain of Dura
